title: cha_om_pruning_for_branching
summary: Pruning cha-om plants to encourage branching and control plant height for food use.
description: This data unit documents pruning of cha-om plants to promote new branch growth and prevent excessive height. The purpose of pruning is to maintain accessibility for food preparation and reduce reliance on purchased food. The pre-pruning condition is referenced by an earlier proof.

external_reference.note: External reference provided for verification only.
